cgcloud__Tour_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Tour_Template__c
cgcloud__Tour_Template__c.description: Stores the details of the tour template object that's to be used for tours.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Cash_Check_In_Required__c.description: Defines whether the cash check-in at the end of each tour is mandatory.

cgcloud__Cash_Handling_Required__c.description: Specifies whether the driver can perform cash-related actions during the tour execution.

cgcloud__Consider_Mileage__c.description: Specifies whether it's mandatory for the driver to document odometer information when beginning and ending the tour.

cgcloud__Consider_Multiple_Warehouses__c.description: Defines if more than one warehouse must be considered for the tour.

cgcloud__Consider_Vehicle_Status__c.description: Specifies whether the driver must check and document the status or damages of the truck (and its trailers) at the beginning and end of the tour.

cgcloud__Consider_Vehicle__c.description: Specifies the vehicle that the driver has to provide identification (license number) for.

cgcloud__Creation_Platform__c.description: Defines the platform on which the template can be used for creating tours.

cgcloud__Default_Currency__c.description: Defines the default currency of the tour template.

cgcloud__Default_Tour_Visit_Duration__c.description: The duration for creating tour-related visits based on the sequence. Itâ€™s measured in minutes.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Express_Check_Out__c.description: Specifies whether express checkout is allowed for this template.

cgcloud__Is_Odometer_Photo_Required__c.description: Specifies whether the user documents the odometer reading at the start and the end of the day with a picture.

cgcloud__Mobility_User_Guidance_End_of_D.description: Mobility user guidance for the end of the day process.

cgcloud__Mobility_User_Guidance_Start_of.description: Mobility user guidance for the start of the day process.

cgcloud__Multiple_Cash_Check_In_Allowed_.description: Defines whether the multiple cash check-ins for one tour are allowed.

cgcloud__Should_Allow_End_Day_Geofencing.description: Specifies whether the validation of the user's GPS location against warehouse location is enabled at the end of the day.

cgcloud__Should_Allow_End_Day_GPS_Tracki.description: Specifies whether GPS tracking is allowed at the end of the day.

cgcloud__Should_Allow_End_Day_Time_Track.description: Specifies whether end-of-day time tracking is allowed.

cgcloud__Should_Allow_Seal_Scanning__c.description: Specifies whether the user validates a list of seals through scanning or manual entry. This field is applicable only when the Express Check-Out field is selected.

cgcloud__Should_Allow_Start_Day_Geofenci.description: Specifies whether the validation of the user's GPS location against warehouse location is enabled at the start of the day.

cgcloud__Should_Allow_Start_Day_GPS_Trac.description: Specifies whether GPS tracking is allowed at the start of the day.

cgcloud__Should_Allow_Start_Day_Time_Tra.description: Specifies whether the day and time tracking for the start of the day is allowed.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales org that the tour template belongs to.

cgcloud__Show_Cash_Info__c.description: Shows cash and expenses information in the tour summary report.

cgcloud__Sync_Options__c.description: Specifies whether an immediate background synchronization is to be started after a special event.
